name: Hungry Birds (luizfernando, Brigadeirim, Marcial Lincoln, WesleyRodrigues)
name_original: Hungry Birds (luizfernando, Brigadeirim, Marcial Lincoln, WesleyRodrigues)
description:
Food is falling from above. Shoot at the food and feed the birds until the grow over and over. Don't miss the colors

Controls -
WASD - Movement
E / Q - Fly down/up
Mouse Left/Right - Light/Heavy Shot

A comida está caindo do céu. Atire na comida e alimente os pássaros até eles crescerem mais e mais. Não erre as cores.

[Play in full screen for a better experience]
